name: url matching
content:
url:

/[(http(s)|(s)ftp(s)?):\/\/(www\.)?a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#=]{2,256}\.[a-z]{2,6}\b/ig
with path
/[(http(s)|(s)ftp(s)?):\/\/(www\.)?a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#=]{2,256}\.[a-z]{2,6}\b([-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\+.~#?&//=]*)/ig

email
/[a-zA-Z0-9]{2,256}?([\.]{1})?(_)?([a-zA-Z0-9_]){2,256}?@([a-zA-Z0-9].)?.[a-zA-Z0-9_]{2,256}\.{1}[a-z]{2,6}\b/ig
